opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of January, 2010, the Resubmission Order of January 4, 2010, having been vacated, all ancillary matters are hereby rendered MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
992 A.2d 74

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 6, 2008.
Decided Jan. 29, 2010.
